CustomField.formula: IF( Related_Account_Plans__c != "" , Hyperlink("/" + Related_Account_Plans__c, Related_Account_Plans__r.Name, "_self" ), IF( Related_Strategy__c != "" , Hyperlink("/" + Related_Strategy__c, Related_Strategy__r.Name, "_self" ), IF( Related_Opportunity__c != "" , Hyperlink("/" + Related_Opportunity__c, Related_Opportunity__r.Name, "_self" ), '')))
CustomField.label: Related To
